item.title: About
item.description: I am a software evolutionist I take in-development systems and make them production ready. A core tenant of my philosophy is believing in the importance of software evolution, in building systems that were made not just to work but made to last. This means taking into consideration the lifecycle of the project at each step of the development and deployment process. I bring with me an “automate everything” mentality in order to keep systems running smoothly and securely as long as possible.
